snippet: PUNDYK--Bernard. Born in 1925 in New York City to Max and Helen Pundyk. Devoted husband to Marcia Pundyk for 60 years. Loving father of four, grandfather of 10 and great-grandfather of one. A veteran of the Navy, he joined Glamorise Foundations in an entry-level position and rose to become the company's CEO. He worked there for 67 years, until his death, where he created a culture that valued innovation, loyalty and, beyond all else, compassion toward colleagues and their extended families. In addition to his wife, he is survived by his children, Jamie Davis, Jeffrey Pundyk, Jon Pundyk and Joanne Goldberg, their families and the countless friends, colleagues, and associates to whom he has quietly offered support, good counsel and generosity over his many years. 1/3
